import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../../layout/breadcrumb' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button } from 'reactstrap' import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import DataTable from 'react-data-table-component' import { supportData, supportColumns } from '../../data/supportdb'; import { Order, Done, Cancel, Pending, Profit, Loss, Running, Smooth } from '../../constant' import axios from 'axios'; const ManageProjects = () => { let [desc , setDesc] =useState({name: ''}); let [data , setData] = useState({}); const postData = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(desc); fetch('https://heroku-aws-deploy.herokuapp.com/predict', { method: 'POST', mode : "cors", // We convert the React state to JSON and send it as the POST body body: JSON.stringify(desc) }).then(function(response) { return response.json(); }).then (res => { console.log(res) data=res}) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } return ( {console.log(data)}
